resources.string:
Registered address is required to pull up the relevant information using the Google CIVIC API. If you do not enter your address that is relevant for your election of choice here, relevant information will not be available.
We do not use your address for any other purpose. It is used for pulling in the ballot information, and the voting location information. The same address is used for searching your representatives, however, we give you an option to change and edit your search and we\'ll save it as the registered address information
The address you provide on this screen or the representative search screen are not stored anywhere else. It is stored on your phone following the Android Security standards
